item.description:
Hey everyone!

Skating was awesome last time, so let's go again!

This time we're heading over to Steriti Rink in the North End. The rink is indoors so we're going regardless of the weather. We're also heading there early in case anyone wants to catch the Pat's game after at 4:30.

Boston Singles is coming too.

Details:

- Skate rental is $5.

1:45 - Meet Joe outside the rink.
2:00 - Go in and get skates.
2:10 - Skate until 3:45-4:00.
4:00 - Get coffee or pizza, or head to the North Star (10 min walk) and catch the Pats game. Whatever people want to do. :)

Scheduling wise, I'm not entirely sure I can make it, but Joe has offered to lead this one in case I can't. And trust me, he knows this rink very well as he's been skating there for years, so you're in good hands.

Parking & Directions

Parking around that time, you should be able to find street parking pretty easily. There aren't any meters or anything like that going on, so you're clear there.

If you're taking the T: Get off at North Station on Orange or Green lines and walk straight about 3 1/2 to 4 blocks down Causeway Street onto Commercial Street until you get there. 5 minutes tops.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Joe outside the venue just before 2:00 pm.
item.name: Singles Skate II - Ice Skating In The North End
